name: Sigiri (Manhattan, New York)
close_time: Open 12.30 PM to 3.30 PM,  5.30 PM to 11 PM
description: Sigiri is a small but excellent Sri Lankan restaurant located in Manhattan, New York serving an authentic and impressive representation of Lankan cuisine.
tip: They don't serve booze, but you can BYOB. No corkage. You can purchase Lion Stout and Lion Lager at the liquor store next door if you want the full Sri Lankan experience.
